process.title: Maintenance Process
process.description: follows a systematic process to ensure every LED & LCD screen gets the best care from inspection to final testing, handled by professional technicians for lasting performance.

stepOne.title: Initial Inspection
stepOne.description: Initial inspection to determine the general condition of the screen and determine maintenance requirements.

stepTwo.title: Dust & Surface Cleaning
stepTwo.description: Clean the inside of the module and connectors to remove dust and signal interference.

stepThree.title: Color & Brightness Calibration
stepThree.description: Adjust the color and brightness to maintain a balanced display.

stepFour.title: Electrical & Cooling Check
stepFour.description: Ensure that the power and cooling systems are working properly to prevent overheating.

stepFive.title: Performance Test & Report
stepFive.description: Performing comprehensive functional tests and providing maintenance reports.

stepSix.title: Long-term Maintenance Plan
stepSix.description: Regular maintenance contract program (monthly, quarterly, and yearly) with a regular schedule and priority support.

pricing.title: Your Service Plan
pricing.description: Choose the maintenance plan that fits your needs. VisionLAB offers flexible options for one-time repairs, monthly care, or annual service all handled by certified technicians to keep your LED & LCD screens in top condition.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: VisionLAB has experience handling various well-known LED and LCD brands with repair services that are precise, safe, and comply with manufacturer standards.

cta.title: Need Screen Repair
cta.description: Discuss your needs with the VisionLAB team. We are ready to help you find the best solution for repair, maintenance, or performance enhancement of your LED & LCD screens.
